name: Towers of Hanoi - Classic Brain Puzzle Game - Also on the Apple Watch
name_original: Towers of Hanoi - Classic Brain Puzzle Game - Also on the Apple Watch
description:
Re-imagine the classic brain training puzzle game, Towers of Hanoi, in a beautiful landscape of Vietnam, even for the Apple Watch.

We've taken a great game and made it even more enjoyable with artistic scenery as well as a more interactive style of gameplay making it playable on the Apple Watch!

- Play it on the Apple Watch
- Enjoy the picturesque landscape
- Challenge friends through game centre
- Unlock more disks to make it even more challenging!
